text:
Поздрави,

Екипът на ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД

 



 

From: Evžen Vosáhlo <vosahlo@myplast.cz> 
Sent: Tuesday, April 2, 2024 10:28 AM
To: Office <office@tibiel.com>
Cc: 'Deyan Valkanov' <toplo.valkanov@gmail.com>
Subject: Invoices for trucks No. 3 and 4

 

Dears,

 

Regarding our contract no. MY-TI-01/2024 – delivery of cooling fills for TEC Bobov Dol:

 

Last week we were waiting for payment of invoice no. ZF9302240011 – truck no. 3 and we didnt receive payment. 

 

We also plan shipping the truck no. 4, so please make payment as well of invoice no. ZF9302240012.

 

Both invoices attached.

 

Thank you.

 

Best regards,

 

Evžen Vosáhlo

 

MYPLAST s.r.o.

Skaštice 159

767 01 Kroměříž

 

+420 734 201 585

vosahlo@myplast.cz <mailto:vosahlo@myplast.cz>
